GET /api.description: serves a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

topics.description: All things dinos big and small!

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

articles.title: NEW Article! Spinosaurus used its sail to FLY
articles.author: DrSaurus

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of the desired article

article.author: DrSaurus
article.title: NEW Article! Spinosaurus used its sail to FLY
article.body: A new publication has just landed claiming Spinosaurus didn't use its sail to swim nor as a mating display, but to actually fly through the air

Get /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments for the given article_id

exampleResponse.author: Cringe-o-pod
exampleResponse.body: As if my childhood hadn't be ruined enough by dinosaurs having feathers...

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: adds new comments to existing articles and serves back the comment as an object

exampleResponse.author: ibelievetheycouldfly
exampleResponse.body: Fascinating and informative article, I'm won over #ibelieve

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates the desired article and serves an object of the updated article

article.author: DrSaurus
article.title: NEW Article! Spinosaurus used its sail to FLY
article.body: A new publication has just landed claiming Spinosaurus didn't use its sail to swim nor as a mating display, but to actually fly through the air

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes the desired comment and serves a 204 with no content

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users
